description: This easy chicken salad is packed with colour and crunch. Itâ€™s perfect for a quick, fresh midweek lunch.
name: 20Minute Chicken Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g chicken breast tenderloins, sliced into 1cm bitesize chunks
420g can no added salt corn kernels
4 slices crusty whole meal bread, to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Crush peanuts in a mortar and pestle or in a ziplock bag with a rolling pin.
Season chicken generously with pepper and cook in a nonstick frying pan over a medium to high heat until golden brown and cooked through. Roughly chop a handful of coriander leaves.

Place rainbow coleslaw and baby spinach and rocket leaves on a platter. Add corn kernels and cooked chicken pieces. Top with crushed peanuts, chopped coriander and a squeeze of lemon. Toss and serve warm.
